item.title: About
item.description: Dr. Rui Cao is an Assistant Professor at the Thrust of Urban Governance and Design, Society Hub, The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (Guangzhou) where he leads the RUI (Responsible Urban Intelligence) Lab . He specializes in Geographic Information Science (GIScience), with a particular interest in GeoAI and Urban Informatics. His research focuses on multi-source spatiotemporal data fusion and its applications in urban sensing and analytics, aiming to advance sustainable and human-centered smart cities for societal benefit.

item.title: Research Group
item.description:
The RUI (Responsible Urban Intelligence) Lab focuses on the research of GeoAI and Urban Informatics based on multisource and multimodal spatiotemporal big data. Our ultimate goal is using geospatial and AI technologies responsibly to help build sustainable and human-centred smart cities for the benefit of society.
